org.deeplearning4j.rl4j.space

Interface ActionSpace<ACTION>

  • Type Parameters:
    ACTION - the type of Action
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionTransformer, DiscreteSpace, HighLowDiscrete, MalmoActionSpace, MalmoActionSpaceDiscrete

    public interface ActionSpace<ACTION>
    Author:
    rubenfiszel (ruben.fiszel@epfl.ch) on 7/8/16.

    Should contain contextual information about the Action space, which is the space of all the actions that could be available. Also must know how to return a randomly uniformly sampled action.
